product_name: Lezyne Zecto Drive Front Bike Light
long_description: Delivering a very noticeable 80 lumens to enhance your visibility, the Lezyne Zecto Drive Front Bike Light mounts anywhere on your bike and uses a USB-rechargable battery for post-ride convenience. 3 bright LEDs offer 3 hr. runtime on high and a 6 hr. 45 min. runtime on flashing. Power Indicator allows the user to check the power level at any time. Light is emitted through the sides to further enhance visibilty. Recharge the Lezyne Zecto Drive Front Bike Light using the integrated USB cable; charge time is 3 hrs.
short_description: Delivering a very noticeable 80 lumens to enhance your visibility, the Lezyne Zecto Drive Front Bike Light mounts anywhere on your bike and uses a USB-rechargable battery for post-ride convenience.
